package.name: xmlrpcpp
package.description: XmlRpc++ is a C++ implementation of the XML-RPC protocol. This version is heavily modified from the package available on SourceForge in order to support roscpp's threading model. As such, we are maintaining our own fork. This version has been modified to be compatible with Secure ROS.
package.author: Chris Morley
Konstantin Pilipchuk
Morgan Quigley
Aravind Sundaresan
